lines.text: Before us lies Germany, within us marches Germany, and after us comes Germany!

The original footage, the original... reality, the truth, is now lost to them forever. The future führers must understand, no matter how carefully you plan or execute your production, you can never get it exactly right. But with editing... a Black Magic... I have edited the imagination of people not yet born.

All this madness... the destruction... the human suffering... I, too, was trapped in the whirlwind we created - an empty mirror filled with hate. I expected God to reach down and stop me... but He never did. Please... please say something. Please help me.
